description: I am a full stack developer and UI/UX designer. I have experience with a wide range of technologies and tools, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next js,Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Redis,MySQL and PostgresSQL. I am also experienced in design tools such as Figma, GIMP and Inkscape. I am a quick learner and have a strong attention to detail. I am a motivated self-starter who is always looking for new challenges.
